channel.title: Recycle bin
channel.description: Is there any way to take the Recycle Bin off of your desktop? If anybody knows say p10x! :P

item.title: Recycle bin
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

rofl deleting the recycle bin… what happends if u connect to the internet? youre temporary files will build to an enormous amount, i hope i dont live to see the day that happens, bullzeye the fbi will be on to you soon, i hope they only make you see the destruction you could have caused and help you stop yourself… seriously dude, if you ever need to talk about youre worrys, just talk to me, dont take it out on the rest of the world by deleting youre recycle bin, for god sake man get a grip. if u were here right now i would slap you… the war is out their man, out their. just dont give up, and keep an eye out in future, i suggest a mod deletes this post before other people get the idea to delete their recycle bin, other wise it will be like 9/11 times a thousand… bullzeye youre lucky mopar hasnt been shut down, the fbi could close this site like a shot if they needed to, and im sure im with other people when i say this, get some help man. for the good of the world. not just youre hard drive.

Read full topic
